name: THE EIGHT TRIGRAMS 「八卦」
description: The eight trigrams are the eight symbols used in Taoist cosmology. Each represented three broken or unbroken lines. The 'broken' lines represent 'yin' energy, and the 'unbroken' lines represent 'yang' energy.  The eight trigrams are Qian (heaven/sky), Kun (earth), Li (fire), Dui (lake/marsh), Kan (water) Zhen (thunder), Xun (wind), and Gen (mountain).
